name: Ballad of Restoration
description: A sweeping refrain that tidies, purifies, and rights what has fallen apart
effect: Purify water, clear debris, and repair simple non-magical objects if all pieces are present

harmony_1.effect: Each harmony grants a bonus die to the next two crafting checks made in this location until a full rest is completed; each successive harmony allows an additional two crafting checks to benefit from the bonus die
